name: Human Medical Billing
description:
Human Medical  is a specialty medical billing company for Medical practices only. We specialize in the entire spectrum of Medical Billing. Our comprehensive services include medical billing, coding, accounts receivable, denial management, advanced reporting and analytics (business intelligence).
Human Medical  has 20+ years of combined experience in the medical collection and medical billing arena. We are members of AMBA, we are rated A+ with the Better Business Bureau, and were awarded 2013 Best Physician Medical Billing Service for Los Angeles. Our agency is adept at assisting medical providers increase revenue quickly and efficiently through our highly effective, proprietary medical collections and billing procedures that are specific to Human Medical Billing practices.
